data.message: Dear Eminem, I know you are supporting the troops and our veterans. It really means a lot and is very much appreciated. My husband is one of them and is suffering from severe PTSD. We are trying to get him a service dog, but even though he was approved for one we have to fight a bureaucracy battle, because he currently doesn't live on US soil (he was stationed in Germany). It would mean the world to us if you would take the time to read our story. www.gofundme.com/PTSD-Dog-For-Chris  Every share could get him the help he needs. Thank you so much!
